Line05.Question: Doch kommt das Wort und faßt es
Line05.Answer: Yet when words come and capture them

Line06.Question: Und führt es vor das Aug’,
Line06.Answer: And bring them before my eyes,

Line07.Question: Wie Nebelgrau erblaßt es
Line07.Answer: They turn pale like grey mist

Line01.Question: Il pleure dans mon cœur
Line01.Answer: The tears fall in my soul

Line02.Question: Comme il pleut sur la ville
Line02.Answer: As the rain on the town

Line05.Question: Ô bruit doux de la pluie
Line05.Answer: Oh sound sweet of the rain

Line06.Question: Par terre et sur les toits!
Line06.Answer: On the ground and on the rooftops

Line08.Question: Ô le bruit de la pluie!
Line08.Answer: Oh the sound of the rain

Line10.Question: Dans ce cœur qui s’écœure.
Line10.Answer: In this soul who is disgusted

Line13.Question: C’est bien la pire peine
Line13.Answer: It is indeed the worst pain

Line16.Question: Mon cœur a tant de peine.
Line16.Answer: My heart has so much of pain

Line01.Question: Du meine Seele, du mein Herz,
Line01.Answer: You my soul you my heart

Line02.Question: Du meine Wonn’, o du mein Schmerz,
Line02.Answer: You my soul you my heart

Line03.Question: Du meine Welt, in der ich lebe,
Line03.Answer: You my world in which I live

Line04.Question: Mein Himmel du, darein ich schwebe,
Line04.Answer: My heaven you, in it I fly (levitate/float),

Line05.Question: O du mein Grab, in das hinab
Line05.Answer: O you my grave in the down

Line07.Question: Du bist die Ruh, du bist der Frieden,
Line07.Answer: You are the repose, you are the peace,

Line08.Question: Du bist vom Himmel mir beschieden.
Line08.Answer: You are from heaven I've decided

Line09.Question: Dass du mich liebst, macht mich mir wert,
Line09.Answer: That you want (my) love, makes myself me value

Line10.Question: Dein Blick hat mich vor mir verklärt,
Line10.Answer: Your eyes got me before I transfigured

Line11.Question: Du hebst mich liebend über mich,
Line11.Answer: You raise me lovingly above myself

Line12.Question: Mein guter Geist, mein bess’res Ich!
Line12.Answer: My better angel/spirit my better self
